snippet: PECK--Norman L. The trustees and staff of BAM and the BAM Endowment Trust mourn the death of Norman L. Peck, a dear friend of the institution for many decades. Norman was a huge supporter of BAM in his role as president of the Peter Jay Sharp Foundation which provided longstanding and generous support for BAM's innovative programming and its endowment. His role in BAM's growth will always be remembered and treasured, as will his warm smile and true love of the arts. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his wife Liliane and his family at this difficult time. Alan H. Fishman, Chairman Brooklyn Academy of Music BAM President, Katy Clark BAM Executive Producer, Joseph V. Melillo BAM President Emerita, Karen Brooks Hopkins BAM President Emeritus, Harvey Lichtenstein BAM and BET Board and Staff 1/3
